item.title: Chicken Fricassee
item.description: I had never had Chicken Fricassee until now. Not that there's anything special about the way the chicken is cooked, but the sauce was extraordinary. The butter, the bits of chicken that are left behind and the mushrooms areÂ brought together by the egg yolks resulting in a creamy and tasty sauce. I used a recipe from "Pantagruel". Ingredients (4 servings) 1 carved chicken or some whole legs and thighs 2 tablespoons butter 1 heaped teaspoon of flour 100g (3.
